branchCategory.name: Metric, North American & European Specifications
branchCategory.description: <P>Series AF modular style air filter is a cost effective, clean looking solution to your filtration needs. Its' modular design allows connection with other SMC air preparation equipment. The series is available in six size options with a wide range of accessories.  <FONT color=#ff0000>The current series is no longer being produced and is subject to available quantities only.  Please utilize the new AF20~40-A series for your product design.</FONT></P>

branchItem.name: AF20-40, Modular Style Air Filter, Epoxy Coated
branchItem.description: <p class="MsoNormal">General purpose 5 micron filtration with modular connectivity to other SMC air preparation components.  External surfaces are epoxy coated to provide an economical alternative for extended life in aggressive or washdown environments.<o:p></o:p></p>
